programme.title: Mat 1: Women's -52kg, Men's -66kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's -52kg and Men's -66kg Finals took place on 28/07/2024 at the Champs-de-Mars Arena. At the Women's -52kg, Diyora Keldiyorova (UZB) claimed the gold, Distria Krasniqi (KOS) took the silver medal, and the two bronze medals were won by Amandine Buchard (FRA) and Larissa Pimenta (BRA). At the Men's -66kg, Hifumi Abe (JPN) won the Gold medal, while Willian Lima (BRA) took the Silver. The Bronze medals were claimed by Denis Vieru (MDA) and Gusman Kyrgyzbayev (KAZ).

programme.title: CHN - PRK - Mixed Doubles Finals | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Finals beteween China v Democratic People's Republic of Korea took place at South Paris Arena 4 on 30/07/24. China won Gold with a final score CHN 4:2 PKR.

programme.title: Women's 10m Air Rifle Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 10m Air Rifle Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 29/07/24. Hyojin Ban (KOR) won Gold with a total of 251.8. Yuting Huang (CHN) won Silver, and Audrey Gogniat (SUI) completed the podium.

programme.title: 10m Air Rifle Mixed Team Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 27/07/2024 at the Chateauroux Shooting Range, Paris. CHN claimed the Gold, KOR the Silver and KAZ completed the podium.

programme.title: India’s Top Pistol Shooter Manu Bakher | Jee Jan Se
programme.desc: Throughout her childhood and teenage years, Manu Bakher switched sports half a dozen times. When she started practicing air pistol shooting, she knew this was the one for her. This is her amazing story.

programme.title: Shooting vs Cricket with Manu Bhaker and Smriti Mandhana | Sports Swap India
programme.desc: What happens in the battle of precision between cricket and shooting? The challenge is on, as Smriti Mandhana and Manu Bhaker swap the pistols and bats.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Tom Daley: 1.6 Seconds | Documentary
programme.desc: This feature documentary dives into the life of the UK’s diving legend. From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.title: Mallo-Breton (FRA) and Kong (HKG) - Women's Épée Individual Gold Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Épée Individual Gold Medal Bout between Auriane Mallo-Breton (FRA) and Man Wai Vivian Kong (HKG) took place on 27/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Mallo-Breton took the Silver,and Kong took the Gold.

programme.title: Pairs, Lightweight Double Sculls, Single Sculls | Rowing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Nautical St - Flat Water, France, on 02/08/24.
At the Men's Pairs Final, Croatia won the Gold, Great Britain took the Silver, and Switzerland claimed the Bronze medal.
At the Women's Pairs Final, it was Gold for Netherlands, Silver for Romania and Bronze for Australia.
At the Men's Lightweight Double Sculls Final, Gold was claimed by Team Ireland, Silver by Team Italy and Bronze by Team Greece.
Finally, at the Women's Lightweight Double Sculls Final, Team Great Britain won the Gold medal, the Silver was claimed by Team Ireland, and the Bronze by Team Greece.

programme.title: Matteo Zurloni Italy’s world champion climbs to the top | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Dive into the remarkable journey of Matteo Zurloni, from small town dreamer to Olympic contender. He won the speed event at the 2023 IFSC Climbing World Championships and earning a shot at Olympic glory. Follow his ascent from humble beginnings to the dizzying heights of international competition, where every climb is a test of skill, courage, and the relentless pursuit of excellence.

programme.title: Men's Gold Medal Match FRA - FIJ | Rugby Sevens | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match between France and Fiji took place on 27/07/2024, at the Stade de France. France took the Gold with a Final Score FRA 28:7 FIJ.

programme.title: Jerry Tuwai: bringing hope from the slum to the nation
programme.desc: Jerry Tuwai grew up in a poor shanty in Fiji playing rugby with plastic bottles. He went on to win the first Olympic medal for his country.

programme.title: Men's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Lukas Maertens (GER) claimed Gold with a time of 3:41.78, Elijah Winnington (AUS) took Silver and Kim Woomin (KOR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Ariarne Titmus (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 3:57.49. Summer McIntosh (CAN) took Silver and Katie Ledecky (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's's 4x100m Freestyle relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with a time of 3:28.92, The United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 4x100m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x100m Freestyle Relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. The United States of America claimed Gold with a time of 3:09.28, Australia took Silver and Italy completed the podium.

programme.title: Meet the young US swimmer who broke Michael Phelps’ record
programme.desc: Carson Foster is one the world’s fastest young swimmers. At the age of 10, he broke one of his idols records: Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's & Women's Freestyle - Day 14 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's Freestyle 74kg and 125kg Semifinals and Freestyle 57kg and 86kg Finals. Rei Higuchi (JPN) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 57kg and Magomed Eldarovitch Ramazanov (BUL) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 86kg. As well as the Women's Freestyle 62kg Semifinals and Freestyle 57kg Finals. Tsugumi Sakurai (JPN) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 57kg.

programme.title: Olympic State of Mind | Motivate yourself with Ariarne Titmus
programme.desc: The power of self-talk and music is all Australia’s swimming sensation, Ariarne Titmus, needs to motivate herself to get her going in her quest to reach the top.

programme.title: Sarah Sjostrom, Sweden’s Swimming Superstar | Splash In
programme.desc: When Sarah slipped and broke her elbow a few months before Tokyo 2020, her fans thought she may not even compete at the Olympics. She fought back, accelerated the recovery, and ended up winning silver in the 50 free. She currently holds 5 World Records and is eyeing Paris 2024 to add new achievements. Soundtrack: Mabel, Let Them Know

programme.title: Nikoloz: The judo World Champion from two nations | The Starting Line
programme.desc: When Nikoloz Sherazadishvili’s family moved him from Georgia to Spain at a young age, his father instilled a love of judo in him. He quickly felt at home at the local club of Brunete, in the outskirt of Madrid, where everything started with his first coach Quino Ruiz. As he gears up for his second Olympics, surrounded by his family and friends, he’s competing on the mat for Spain but also holding Georgia and the memory of his father close to his heart.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Tom Daley: 1.6 Seconds | Documentary
programme.desc: This feature documentary dives into the life of the UK’s diving legend. From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.title: Women's Cross-Country | Cycling Mountain Bike | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Women's Cross-Country Final at Elancourt Hill, Paris, on 28/07/24. Pauline Ferrand Prevot (FRA) claimed the Gold, Haley Batten (USA) the Silver and Jenny Rissveds (SWE) the Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Gold Medal Match FRA - FIJ | Rugby Sevens | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match between France and Fiji took place on 27/07/2024, at the Stade de France. France took the Gold with a Final Score FRA 28:7 FIJ.

programme.title: Men's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Lukas Maertens (GER) claimed Gold with a time of 3:41.78, Elijah Winnington (AUS) took Silver and Kim Woomin (KOR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Ariarne Titmus (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 3:57.49. Summer McIntosh (CAN) took Silver and Katie Ledecky (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's's 4x100m Freestyle relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with a time of 3:28.92, The United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Tuskers Volleyball Club
programme.desc: Team USA Olympic hero Danielle Scott-Arruda travels to London, England to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling volleyball team.

programme.title: Deva Handball Club
programme.desc: Team Sweden Olympic hero Thomas Sivertsson travels to Great Britain to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling handball team.
